content.title: 🎉 Mateluxue Milestone Reached: Thank You & Exciting New Opportunities! 🌟
content.creator:
Mateluxue E-Ink Phone Case
February 17, 2025
content.content:
Hello, amazing supporters! 🌟
We are thrilled to announce that our Mateluxue project has soared past its crowdfunding goal by an incredible 137%, with over 115 backers joining our journey! 🚀
Your support has been the driving force behind our success, and we are deeply grateful for every single one of you. Thank you for believing in our vision and making this possible! ❤️
Now, to keep the momentum going and bring Mateluxue to even more people, we are excited to introduce the Kickbooster program! 🎈
🤝By becoming a part of this program, you'll receive a distinctive referral link, which you can readily share within your social circles. Every successful referral through your link will not only contribute to our campaign's success but also earn you 10% commissions.
🔥 PARTICIPATION IS A BREEZE:

1️⃣ Visit our sign-up page below and register to become a Booster for our campaign.

2️⃣ Click "Boost our Campaign!" to get your personalized link to share.

3️⃣ Disseminate the link across platforms like Facebook, Twitter, your Blog, Website, or wherever your reach is felt.

4️⃣ Monitor your referral progress via the Kickbooster dashboard and enjoy your cashback.

⬇️ Boost Mateluxue Campaign⬇️

You will automatically receive the cash reward through the Kickbooster platform after the Mateluxue campaign ends.
Once again, thank you for your unwavering support! We can't wait to share more updates with you as we move forward. Stay tuned! 🌟
Keep spreading the word and let's make Mateluxue a reality together! 🌍

Best,
The Mateluxue Team
